By Sunday, Bukele posted videos of Venezuelan men being brutally marched off planes in shackles on social media. Hernández Romero's lawyers scanned the footage frame by frame.  >They saw him.  >“He was crying, begging guards, ‘I’m gay! I’m a stylist!’” Toczylowski said. “He was being slapped, his head forcibly shaved. And then he disappeared into the dark.”
